95.7: for he is our God.We are the people he watches over,the flock under his care. If only you would listen to his voice today!
95.9: For there your ancestors tested and tried my patience,even though they saw everything I did.
95.10: For forty years I was angry with them, and I said,‘They are a people whose hearts turn away from me.They refuse to do what I tell them.’
95.3: For the LORD is a great God,a great King above all gods.
95.11: So in my anger I took an oath:‘They will never enter my place of rest.’”
95.2: Let us come to him with thanksgiving.Let us sing psalms of praise to him.
95.1: Come, let us sing to the LORD!Let us shout joyfully to the Rock of our salvation.
95.4: He holds in his hands the depths of the earthand the mightiest mountains.
95.6: Come, let us worship and bow down.Let us kneel before the LORD our maker,
95.5: The sea belongs to him, for he made it.His hands formed the dry land, too.
95.8: The LORD says, “Don’t harden your hearts as Israel did at Meribah,as they did at Massah in the wilderness.
